m_szDocTitle: OPINION: The New, New Thing — Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicles - Law360
m_szDocSumamry: OPINION: The New, New Thing — Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicles   Law360, New York (April 21, 2015,  4:10 PM ET) -- Elon Musk, who introduced us to his Tesla electric car, scoffed at the notion of a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle. He called it a “fool cell.” A former U.S. Energy Secretary said that for hydrogen fuel cell cars to become a real choice “they need four miracles, and it only takes three to become a saint.” But it didn’t take four miracles! And it isn’t a “fool cell.” Just a few months ago, Toyota announced the world’s first commercial hydrogen fuel cell vehicle for sale. It... To view the fu
